abstract: Moving to show investors he is serious about a turnaround at Sears, Edward S. Lampert, the retailer’s billionaire chairman, said the company’s chief executive, Aylwin B. Lewis, would step down.
snippet: Moving to show investors he is serious about a turnaround at Sears, Edward S. Lampert, the retailer’s billionaire chairman, said the company’s chief executive, Aylwin B. Lewis, would step down.
lead_paragraph: Wanted: a retail chief who can do more with less  and save Sears.

headline.main: Chief of Sears to Step Down
